ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: Some very simple method functions for confidence interval calculation, bootstrap resampling, and to distill pertinent information from a potentially complex object; primarily used in common with packages extRemes and SpatialVx.

Some very simple method functions for confidence interval calculation, bootstrap resampling, and to distill pertinent information from a potentially complex object; primarily used in common with packages extRemes and SpatialVx.

name: r-distillery
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2-2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-distillery
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/distillery_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/distillery/distillery_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 990d504f544c3a01050030001079664946f6e2d1f6d0233222f3ff220bce5de7

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1
  script: R CMD INSTALL --build .
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('distillery')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('distillery')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.ral.ucar.edu/staff/ericg
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Some very simple method functions for confidence interval calculation, bootstrap resampling, and to distill pertinent information from a potentially complex object; primarily used in common with packages extRemes and SpatialVx.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - jsignell

# Package: distillery
# Version: 1.0-6
# Date: 2019-03-28
# Title: Method Functions for Confidence Intervals and to Distill Information from an Object
# Author: Eric Gilleland
# Maintainer: Eric Gilleland <ericg@ucar.edu>
# Depends: R (>= 2.10.0)
# Description: Some very simple method functions for confidence interval calculation, bootstrap resampling, and to distill pertinent information from a potentially complex object; primarily used in common with packages extRemes and SpatialVx.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: http://www.ral.ucar.edu/staff/ericg
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-04-02 17:12:03 UTC; eric
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-04-02 19:50:03 UTC
